import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [fromData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); // const { // company, // website, // location, // status, // skills, // githubusername, // bio, // twitter, // facebook, // linkedin, // youtube, // instagram // } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...fromData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

Create Your Profile

* = required field

Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional

)} Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
